authors.name: Chloe A Hecht
authors.affiliation: Department of Biochemistry, Stanford University School of Medicine; Aligning Science Across Parkinson's Disease

authors.name: Suzanne Pfeffer
authors.affiliation: Department of Biochemistry, Stanford University School of Medicine; Aligning Science Across Parkinson's Disease

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"284a8","text":"We present here a CellProfiler software pipeline to quantify the intensity of endogenous TMEM55B or pRab10 in LRRK2 R1441C or VPS35 D620N MEF cells transfected with a Myc-RILPL1 plasmid detected using an anti-Myc antibody in conjunction with 4X expansion super-resolution microscopy or regular immunofluorescence microscopy. This protocol works in conjunction with Nikon Spinning disk confocal images acquired with Metamorph software (Molecular Devices, LLC) or Zeiss laser scanning confocal microscope acquired using Zen 3.4. Acquired files have a .nd or a .czi format respectively; we use the associated .TIF raw files in this pipeline. Images are maximum intensity projected from the Z-stack acquired during imaging and used for CellProfiler analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"9666v","text":"Latest edition CellProfiler 4.04 (or later)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"n8rh","text":"Maximum intensity projection raw .TIF files that accompany .nd files by Metamorph","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ktle","text":"or","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afbfn","text":"Maximum intensity projection raw .TIF files that accompany .czi files by Zen 3.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working
